Uses of Package
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.executor

Packages that use it.unipr.sowide.actodes.executor 
Package Description
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.configuration
Provides classes defining the components for defining the initial configuration of an actor space.
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.controller
Provides classes and interfaces defining the main components that drive the execution of an actor space.
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.examples.naming
Shows how the naming service can be used for synchronizing some actors.
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.examples.simulation
Shows a simulation of the classical dining philosophers concurrency problem.
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.executor
Provides classes implementing the different behaviors that can be used for managing the execution of the other actors (excluding the other special actor, i.e., the service provider) of the actor space.
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.executor.active
Provides classes defining the executor actors that coordinate the execution of active actors.
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.executor.passive
Provides classes defining the executor actors that drive the execution of passive actors.
  • Classes in it.unipr.sowide.actodes.executor used by it.unipr.sowide.actodes.configuration 
    Class Description
    Executor
    The Executor class provides a partial implementation of the behaviors used by the executor actor for managing the execution of the other actors (excluding the other special actor, i.e., the service provider) of the actor space.
    ExecutorActor
    The ExecutorActor class defines the executor actor of an actor space, i.e., the actor that manages the execution of the other actors (excluding the other special actor, i.e., the service provider) of the actor space.
  • Classes in it.unipr.sowide.actodes.executor used by it.unipr.sowide.actodes.controller 
    Class Description
    Executor
    The Executor class provides a partial implementation of the behaviors used by the executor actor for managing the execution of the other actors (excluding the other special actor, i.e., the service provider) of the actor space.
  • Classes in it.unipr.sowide.actodes.executor used by it.unipr.sowide.actodes.examples.naming 
    Class Description

    The Executor class provides a partial implementation of the behaviors used by the executor actor for managing the execution of the other actors (excluding the other special actor, i.e., the service provider) of the actor space.
  • Classes in it.unipr.sowide.actodes.executor used by it.unipr.sowide.actodes.examples.simulation 
    Class Description
    Executor
    The Executor class provides a partial implementation of the behaviors used by the executor actor for managing the execution of the other actors (excluding the other special actor, i.e., the service provider) of the actor space.
  • Classes in it.unipr.sowide.actodes.executor used by it.unipr.sowide.actodes.executor 
    Class Description
    Executor
    The Executor class provides a partial implementation of the behaviors used by the executor actor for managing the execution of the other actors (excluding the other special actor, i.e., the service provider) of the actor space.
    Termination
    The Termination interface defines a termination condition of the execution of an executor actor.
  • Classes in it.unipr.sowide.actodes.executor used by it.unipr.sowide.actodes.executor.active 
    Class Description
    Executor
    The Executor class provides a partial implementation of the behaviors used by the executor actor for managing the execution of the other actors (excluding the other special actor, i.e., the service provider) of the actor space.
    Termination
    The Termination interface defines a termination condition of the execution of an executor actor.
